content:
ITEM NO.15               COURT NO.12               SECTION II-B
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
Petition(s) for Special Leave to Appeal (Crl.)  No(s).  9525/2025
[Arising out of impugned final judgment and order dated  18-03-2025
in CRMM No. 2492/2025 passed by the High Court of Punjab & Haryana 
at Chandigarh]
ANGREJ SINGH                                       Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
STATE OF PUNJAB                                    Respondent(s)
FOR ADMISSION 
IA No. 151505/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING O.T.
 
Date : 07-07-2025 This matter was called on for hearing today.
CORAM :  HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE PANKAJ MITHAL
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE K.V. VISWANATHAN
[PARTIAL COURT WORKING DAYS BENCH]
For Petitioner(s)  Ms. Aarushi Singh, Adv.
                   Mr. Aditya Vaibhav Singh, Adv.
                   Ms. Vanya Gupta, AOR
                   Ms. Riya Parihar, Adv.
                   Mr. Ashutosh Tiwari, Adv.                   
                   
For Respondent(s)  
          UPON hearing the counsel the Court made the following
                             O R D E R
Issue notice, returnable within six weeks.
(VARSHA MENDIRATTA)                             (NIDHI MATHUR)
COURT MASTER (SH)                             COURT MASTER (NSH)
